definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: Be responsible for balance of intercompany AP / AR.
sentences.chinese: 负责关联公司的内部往来对账。

sentences.english: Please check your account regularly. In case of any unconformity, please contact bank immediately.
sentences.chinese: 定期对账，一旦发现不符，应及时与银行联系。

sentences.english: Account check with suppliers and inter-company every month.
sentences.chinese: 每月供应商对账，内部公司对账。

sentences.chinese: 每月供应商对账，内部公司对账。

definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對賬|对账[dui4 zhang4]

to settle a bill/to close an account
